title: Create groomer onboarding page with signup and service management

requirements.summary: Create a new frontend page/route for groomer onboarding at /groomer-onboard that allows groomers to sign up and register with the platform
acceptanceCriteria: A new route /groomer-onboard is accessible in the application
The page displays a signup form for groomers
The page uses the existing Chewy blue color palette consistently

file_operations.description: Create the main groomer onboarding page component with route at /groomer-onboard, displaying a signup form for groomers using the existing Chewy blue color tokens and consistent styling from the scheduler page.
Add routing configuration to register the /groomer-onboard route and render the GroomerOnboardPage component, enabling navigation to the groomer onboarding flow.

requirements.summary: Design the groomer onboarding flow to collect groomer details including name, contact information, business information, and any other relevant registration fields
acceptanceCriteria: Form fields capture groomer name, email, phone, and business name at minimum
Form validation provides clear feedback for required and invalid fields
The form layout follows the existing scheduler page design patterns

file_operations.description: Create a form component capturing groomer profile fields (name, email, phone, business name) with validation, error feedback, and consistent styling matching the scheduler page design patterns and Chewy blue theme.

requirements.summary: Add a service listing interface within the groomer onboarding flow that allows groomers to add, edit, and remove their service offerings with title, description, and price range
acceptanceCriteria: Groomers can add multiple services with title, description, and price range fields
Each service entry can be edited or removed before submission
The service list UI is clear and easy to use

file_operations.description: Create a service management UI component allowing groomers to add, edit, and remove service entries with title, description, and price range fields, ensuring clear and intuitive list management with Chewy blue styling.

requirements.summary: Apply the existing Chewy blue color scheme and typography from the scheduler page consistently across all groomer onboarding UI elements including buttons, form inputs, focus states, and interactive elements
acceptanceCriteria: All primary buttons use Chewy blue styling matching the scheduler page
Form input focus states use Chewy blue borders and rings
Typography matches the existing scheduler page fonts and hierarchy
The visual theme is consistent with the scheduler flow in both light and dark modes

file_operations.description: Ensure the onboarding page applies Chewy blue color tokens and typography consistently across all UI elements, matching the scheduler page theme in both light and dark modes.
Apply Chewy blue focus states, button styling, and typography to all form inputs and interactive elements, ensuring consistency with the scheduler page design.
Apply Chewy blue styling to service management buttons, inputs, and interactive elements, ensuring consistent theming with the scheduler page.

requirements.summary: Connect the groomer onboarding frontend form to the backend registration methods using React Query, including loading states during submission and success/error feedback after submission
acceptanceCriteria: Form submission triggers a backend call to register the groomer
Loading spinner or disabled state appears during submission
Success message displays when registration completes successfully
Error message displays with retry option if registration fails

file_operations.description: Create a React Query mutation hook that calls the backend registerGroomer method, handling loading states, success responses, and error handling for groomer registration.

Integrate the useRegisterGroomer hook to handle form submission, display loading states during backend calls, show success feedback on completion, and display error messages with retry options on failure.

requirements.summary: Add navigation from the scheduler page to the groomer onboarding page, and vice versa, so users can easily access both flows
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled link or button on the scheduler page navigates to /groomer-onboard
A link or button on the onboarding page returns to the scheduler
Navigation preserves the existing Chewy blue styling

file_operations.description: Add a clearly labeled navigation link or button that routes to /groomer-onboard, styled with Chewy blue tokens to maintain visual consistency.
Add a navigation link or button that returns users to the scheduler page, ensuring Chewy blue styling consistency.
